name: Performance Pilates Arch Mat FSC® Certified Natural Rubber - Chocolate
description:
Your order also comes with a free gift with purchase travel size premium botanical skincare "oil la la" from our friends at lelive. 
Sculpted. Supported. Sustainably.
Get ready to elevate your Pilates experience with our ethically made FSC® Certified Natural Rubber Performance Pilates Mat.
Sustainability meets studio grade support.
Crafted from responsibly sourced FSC natural rubber, this mat delivers superior grip, cushioning, and stability, empowering every movement with purpose and intention.
 
Why You’ll Love It
FSC® Certified Natural Rubber: Responsibly sourced from sustainably managed forests.
Aesthetic + Spacious Double Arch Design
Superior Grip: Our infamous ultra grip top layer supports your every move.
Cushioned Comfort: Choose 5mm or 8mm thickness for the ultimate comfort and support. Our cushioned technology minimises impact and protects your joints, knees and spine without detracting from your movement. 
Non toxic, Glue + PVC Free: Made with you and the environment in mind.
Minimalist Design: Matte finish, delicious colour ways and sleek new silhouette that elevate any studio or home space.
Durable Density: Made to last. No flaking or tearing. Built to support daily practice without compression or wear.
 
The Feel
Anything is possible with the right support.
Held under hand, stable under foot. Delicious colour ways you can taste.
The perfect balance of comfort and control so the focus stays on your practice.

The Detail
660mm x 1800mm
Choose from either 5mm or 8mm thickness
Aesthetic + Spacious Double Arch Design
FSC® Certified Natural Rubber
Non Toxic. PVC free.

name: The Original Paws Sticky Grip Yoga Mat. FSC® Certified Natural Rubber -  Wild Forest
description:
Grip that sticks. Support that shows up.
The mat that made us famous.
Our classic sticky grip built for high-performance grip and grounded stability, Vogue named us every Yoga Teacher’s favourite mat for a reason.
Because when you can trust your mat to hold and support you the rest just clicks.
 
Why You’ll Love It
Unbeatable grip,  even in hot, sweaty flows. 
Engineered for performance with an ultra sticky grip top layer and stable, supportive base.
FSC™ certified Rubber meaning our rubber is traceable and from a renewable protected source and biodegradable in correct landfill conditions. 
Built to last. Durable by design: tear-resistant, high-tensile rubber that won’t flake, stretch, or roll mid-flow
Subtle alignment guides for intuitive precision without distraction
For the yogi who wants their mat to work as hard as they do.

name: Flow Paws - Natural rubber extreme grip yoga mat
description:
The mat that holds you - so you can surf all of life's big waves.
 


World First Innovation: Vivid photographic print on sustainable rubber.


Ultra grip, zero slip: Stays put—even in your sweatiest downward dog


Sweat-friendly surface: Gets grippier the more you move


Cushioned comfort: 4mm of joint-loving support


Subtle alignment guides: For hitting your marks without overthinking it


Planet-kind materials: Sustainably sourced, biodegradable rubber


Tough love: No flaking, peeling, or giving up mid-flow




Your journey is yours. But we’re right here beside you.

name: EverGrip Non Slip Matte Yoga Mat. FSC® Certified Natural Rubber - Warm Sand
description:
Grip that never quits.
Easy clean. Built to last. Matte feel. Ultra Grip. 
Why we made this
Introducing our latest innovation “Ever Grip”.
After a decade of creating Yoga mats for you, your home & your favourite studios we created Ever Grip.
Our unique innovation created to be more durable, long lasting and be non marking.
The feel is a “matte grip”.  Its everything you’d expect from a Yogi Bare; grippy, supportive, non slip but the feeling is more natural than sticky.
 
Why You’ll Love It
FSC® Certified Natural Rubber: Responsibly sourced from sustainably managed forests.
Superior Grip: Our infamous ultra grip top layer now in an anti sweat stain surface supports your every move.
Non toxic, Glue + PVC Free: Made with you and the environment in mind.
Minimalist Design: Matte finish, delicious colour ways and sleek new silhouette that elevate any studio or home space.
Durable Density: Made to last. No flaking or tearing. Built to support daily practice without compression or wear.
Tough and durable: Made to handle daily practice without wearing down
Wipe clean finish: Sweat, spills, and smudges wipe right off
Supportive: 4mm cushioning for joint support, stability and comfort
Non-toxic materials: Free from PVC, TPE and harsh chemicals glues or dyes.
Innovated for life: Our favourite Paws mat. Reimagined. Anti sweat stain surface.
